name: Io.Games - Slither Snake And Worms Mmo Battle Royale
name_original: Io.Games - Slither Snake And Worms Mmo Battle Royale
description:
Now, can you become the biggest worm?

Even if you're tiny, you have a chance to win. If you're skilled or lucky, you can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them!

Eat the food to grow up, or kill the other snakes.
If your head touches another worm, you will explode and then it's game over.

Main features:
- No lag or performances issues. Works on every mobile device.
- Smooth joystick controls
- Unlock many skins
- Try to beat your highest score
- Challenge your friends with the in-game leaderboard
- Internet connection is not needed, play wherever, you are offline or online

How long can you survive? Are you the sneaky snake who will be the last one to stand? Can you defeat others without making a simple mistake?

So what are you waiting for, download Hungry Slither.io Now while its FREE!
